A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love the movie! I watched the whole thing and I wasn't bored at all. Sure it is very different to the orginals\, I never liked the other movies. the director was horrible\, and I know this was not perfect\, but I'm sorry I loved it! I would say they tried too hard on the joke\, it remind me of the new Thor movie\, and how it became a comedy\, and I would agree they need to hold some of them back. But give it a chance.
